text: In any derivative proceeding in the right of a foreign nonprofit corporation, the matters covered by this subchapter shall be governed by the laws of the jurisdiction of incorporation of the foreign corporation, except for §§ 29- 411.04, 29-411.06, and 29-411.07.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

DC CODE § 29-411.08

Current through December 11, 2012
